Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Doppelganger makes 2 melee attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Read Thoughts, The Doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within range.  The effect can penetrate thin barriers, it is known that a thin sheet of lead blocks this effect

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form.  Its statistics are the same in each form
Abilities.Ability 2: Ambusher, In the first round of combat, the Doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised
Abilities.Ability 3: Surprise Attack, If the Doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra Average 10 damage from the attack
